title.value: Seeking Interpretability and Explainability in Binary Activated Neural Networks
title.justification: Matches the title provided at the beginning of the paper.
title.quote: Seeking Interpretability and Explainability in Binary Activated Neural Networks

extractions.description: The paper explores the use of binary activated neural networks to achieve interpretability and explainability in regression tasks using tabular data. It introduces and analyzes a greedy algorithm, the Binary Greedy Network (BGN), designed to construct these networks one neuron at a time, optimizing their architecture for task-specific requirements. The study further proposes an efficient computation method for SHAP values to assess individual contributions of network elements, including features, neurons, and connections, enhancing the interpretability of binary activated networks.

type.justification: The paper primarily focuses on theoretical constructs such as mathematical observations and theoretical foundations
type.quote: We first derive mathematical observations that help understand the inner workings of the BANNs family of predictors. This analysis provides the theoretical underpinnings of our second contribution: a greedy algorithm denominated BGN...

name.justification: The research focuses on enhancing the interpretability and explainability of binary neural networks, which falls under interpretable machine learning techniques.
name.quote: We study the use of binary activated neural networks as interpretable and explainable predictors...

name.justification: The paper deals with regression tasks using binary activated neural networks.
name.quote: ...as interpretable and explainable predictors in the context of regression tasks on tabular data.

name.justification: The paper discusses network pruning methods as part of making neural networks more interpretable and compact.
name.quote: ...methods such as network pruning, weight sharing or matrix factorization allow compacting a trained NN...

name.justification: The paper introduces methods to determine the importance of features, neurons, and connections in neural networks.
name.quote: Quantifying the relative importance of the features, hidden neurons, and individual connections (weights) of these particular networks.

name.justification: The study emphasizes the development and analysis of binary activated neural networks.
name.quote: We focus on binary activated neural networks (BANNs), i.e. NNs where all of the activation functions are binary steps...

name.justification: The BGN model is introduced as a new contribution for building interpretable binary activated networks.
name.quote: This analysis provides the theoretical underpinnings of our second contribution: a greedy algorithm denominated BGN (Binary Greedy Networks)...

is_contributed.justification: BGN is a novel model introduced by the authors.
is_contributed.quote: Our work sets forth a new family of predictors to consider when interpretability is of importance.

is_executed.justification: The BGN algorithm is implemented and executed as indicated by the numerical experiments section.
is_executed.quote: Finally, we present comprehensive empirical experiments, showing BGN effectively yields efficient predictors...

is_compared.justification: The BGN model is compared to other baseline models such as decision trees and various BNN training algorithms.
is_compared.quote: Finally, we present comprehensive empirical experiments, showing BGN effectively yields efficient predictors, competitive to other BANN training algorithms...

referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper proposes and uses the BGN model itself as a new contribution.
referenced_paper_title.quote: This analysis provides the theoretical underpinnings of our second contribution: a greedy algorithm denominated BGN (Binary Greedy Networks)...

name.justification: The dataset is used for experiments in the paper.

referenced_paper_title.value: Event labeling combining ensemble detectors and background knowledge
referenced_paper_title.justification: Referenced in the experiments section for evaluating BGN's performance.

name.justification: The paper uses SHAP values for feature importance analysis.
name.quote: We then characterize the method by efficiently computing complementary SHAP explanations within binary activated network models.

referenced_paper_title.value: A Unified Approach to Interpreting Model Predictions
referenced_paper_title.justification: The SHAP method is cited and used for explainability in the paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: SHAP values [37] explain the impact of the different features of a model on its predictions.
